General.Name: Suzhou Yangtze New Materials
General.Description: Suzhou Yangtze New Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of functional and decorative materials in China. The company offers antistatic and antibacterial color coated boards, anti-VHP oxidation color coated plates, and HAS constant resistance boards, as well as provides weather resistance and insulation color coated boards, anti-scratch and wear-resistant color coated plates, pearl series color coated boards, home appliance PSM boards, and laminated boards. It also offers anodized composite panels, interior and exterior wall decoration panels, and metal printing insulation boards. The company's products are used in public transportation, space construction, home decoration, home appliances, furniture decoration, medicine, and other fields. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Suzhou, China.
